com.squareup.picasso

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.squareup.picasso.Request

  • public final class Request
extends java.lang.Object
    Immutable data about an image and the transformations that will be applied to it.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Request.Builder
      Builder for creating Request instances.

      Target image config for decoding.
      boolean hasRotationPivot
      Whether or not rotationPivotX and rotationPivotY are set.

      The priority of this request.
      boolean purgeable
      True if image should be decoded with inPurgeable and inInputShareable.

      The image resource ID.

      Amount to rotate the image in degrees.

      Rotation pivot on the X axis.

    • Field Detail

      • uri

        public final android.net.Uri uri
        The image URI.

        This is mutually exclusive with resourceId.

      • resourceId

        public final int resourceId
        The image resource ID.

        This is mutually exclusive with uri.

      • stableKey

        public final java.lang.String stableKey
        Optional stable key for this request to be used instead of the URI or resource ID when caching. Two requests with the same value are considered to be for the same resource.

      • transformations

        public final java.util.List<Transformation> transformations
        List of custom transformations to be applied after the built-in transformations.

      • targetWidth

        public final int targetWidth
        Target image width for resizing.

      • targetHeight

        public final int targetHeight
        Target image height for resizing.

      • centerCrop

        public final boolean centerCrop
        True if the final image should use the 'centerCrop' scale technique.

        This is mutually exclusive with centerInside.

      • centerInside

        public final boolean centerInside
        True if the final image should use the 'centerInside' scale technique.

        This is mutually exclusive with centerCrop.

      • onlyScaleDown

        public final boolean onlyScaleDown

      • rotationDegrees

        public final float rotationDegrees
        Amount to rotate the image in degrees.

      • rotationPivotX

        public final float rotationPivotX
        Rotation pivot on the X axis.

      • rotationPivotY

        public final float rotationPivotY
        Rotation pivot on the Y axis.

      • hasRotationPivot

        public final boolean hasRotationPivot
        Whether or not rotationPivotX and rotationPivotY are set.

      • purgeable

        public final boolean purgeable
        True if image should be decoded with inPurgeable and inInputShareable.

      • config

        public final android.graphics.Bitmap.Config config
        Target image config for decoding.

      • priority

        public final Picasso.Priority priority
        The priority of this request.
